data.name: CHSG0001Description
data.value: The message type specified in SagaStepAttribute must implement ISagaMessage interface.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: CHSG0001MessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' does not implement ISagaMessage interface
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: CHSG0001Title
data.value: SagaStep message type must implement ISagaMessage

data.name: CHSG0002Description
data.value: SagaStepAttribute can only be applied to classes that implement ISaga interface.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: CHSG0002MessageFormat
data.value: Class '{0}' with SagaStepAttribute must implement ISaga interface
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: CHSG0003Description
data.value: The exception types specified in RetryOnExceptions property must inherit from System.Exception.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: CHSG0003MessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' in RetryOnExceptions does not inherit from System.Exception
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: CHSG0003Title
data.value: RetryOnExceptions must contain only Exception types

data.name: CHSG0004Description
data.value: The exception types specified in NonRetryableExceptions property must inherit from System.Exception.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: CHSG0004MessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' in NonRetryableExceptions does not inherit from System.Exception
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: CHSG0004Title
data.value: NonRetryableExceptions must contain only Exception types

data.name: CHSG0005Description
data.value: In the Saga pattern, a pivot point represents the point of no return. A saga can have at most one pivot point. After the pivot point executes, compensating transactions are no longer relevant.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: CHSG0005MessageFormat
data.value: Class '{0}' has {1} pivot points but can have at most one
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: CHSG0005Title
data.value: Saga can have at most one pivot point
